de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.pca

Class PCAFilteredRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.pca.PCARunner
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.pca.PCAFilteredRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PCAFilteredAutotuningRunner

    public class PCAFilteredRunner
extends PCARunner
    PCA runner that will do dimensionality reduction. PCA is computed as with the regular runner, but afterwards, an EigenPairFilter is applied.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
